source: 检察官提出拘留申请，即希望继续拘留你的要求。

source: 在这之前，首先解释几个注意和说明事项。

source: 首先第一，你有沉默权。

translation_B: First, you have the right to remain silent.
translation_C: First of all, you have the right to remain silent.
translation_D: First of all, you have the right to remain silent.

source: 对于我的提问，你既可以自始至终保持沉默，也可以拒绝回答其中的个别问题。
translation_A: You have the right to remain silent throughout my questioning, or you may refuse to answer individual questions.
translation_B: You can remain silent about my questions from beginning to end, or you can refuse to answer individual questions.
translation_C: You may remain silent throughout my questioning, or you may refuse to answer individual questions.
translation_D: You have the right to remain silent throughout my questioning, or to refuse to answer any specific question.

source: 但不会因为你没有回答问题，而对你有不利的待遇。
translation_A: It shall not be to your disadvantage to remain silent or to refuse to answer any of my questions.
translation_B: Not answering is not necessarily a disadvantage.
translation_C: Just because you don't answer doesn't mean you're going to be treated unfavorably.
translation_D: You will not be treated unfavorably solely because you choose not to answer.

source: 第二，你有用自己的费用选任辩护人的权利。
translation_A: Secondly, you have the right to appoint a defense attorney at your own expense.
translation_B: Second, you have the right to appoint your defense counsel at your own expense.
translation_C: Secondly, you have the right to engage a lawyer of your own choice at your own expense.
translation_D: Second, you have the right to appoint a defense attorney at your own expense.

source: 如果你想选任辩护人，却又没有认识的辩护人时，也可以通过律师会来选任。
translation_A: If you wish to appoint counsel, but do not have any information about defense counsels, the court can help you find an attorney to represent you through a bar association.
translation_B: If you want to appoint a defense attorney but do not know a defense attorney, there is a way to appoint one through the bar association.
translation_C: If you wish to appoint a defence counsel but do not know of any suitable one, you may request the bar association to make the appointment.
translation_D: If you wish to appoint a defense attorney but do not know of any, there is a method to appoint one through the bar association.

source: 如果你有这样的要求，将由法院来通知律师会。所以，假如你希望，请提出要求。
translation_A: If you have such a request, the court will notify the bar association, so please don't hesitate to let us know if you wish.
translation_B: If such a request is made, the court will notify the bar association. So, if you wish to make such a request, please do not hesitate to mention it.
translation_C: Do not hesitate to apply to the court to find a counsel. If requested, the court will notify a bar association at your request.
translation_D: If there is such a request, the court will notify the bar association, so please do not hesitate to tell us if you wish.

source: 如果你出于经济等原因无法自费选任辩护人时，可以请求审判官为你选任辩护人。
translation_A: If you are unable to appoint a lawyer at your own expense for economic or other reasons, you may request the court to appoint a lawyer.
translation_B: If you cannot afford to appoint a defense counsel at your own expense for economic or other reasons, you may request a judge to appoint one.
translation_C: If you are unable to appoint a defense attorney at your own expense, for reasons such as financial reasons, you can request that a judge appoint a defense attorney.
translation_D: If you are unable to appoint a defense attorney at your own expense due to financial reasons, you can request the judge to appoint a defense attorney for you.

source: 如果要提出此请求，必须提交财力申报书。
translation_A: To make this claim, you must submit a financial status declaration.
translation_B: If you wish to make this request, you should first submit a report of financial resources.
translation_C: When filing this claim, an oath of assets must be submitted.

source: 同时，如果财力申报书的财力总额达到50万日元以上时，必须提前向○○律师会申请选任辩护人。
translation_A: In addition, if the total amount of resources in the financial declaration form is 500,000 yen or more, you must apply in advance to the XX Bar Association for the appointment of a defense attorney.
translation_B: If the total amount of assets in the asset declaration exceeds 500,000 yen, you must apply for the appointment of a defense lawyer from the ○○ Bar Association in advance.
translation_C: If you have a total of 500,000 yen or more as your own resources, you should request the Association to appoint a defense counsel beforehand.
translation_D: Furthermore, if the total amount of assets in the affidavit of assets exceeds ¥500,000, you must file a request for the court-appointed attorney with the ○○ Bar Association in advance.

source: 在有相当理由足以怀疑你犯了罪，并且没有固定的住址时，或者有相当理由足以怀疑你可能隐灭证据或逃跑时，你也许会被拘留。
translation_A: You may be detained if there is a reasonable ground to suspect that you have committed an offence and if there is a reasonable ground to suspect that you are likely to abscond or destroy evidence, as you have no fixed abode.
translation_B: You might be held in detention if the court finds probable cause to suspect that you have committed the crime as along with one or more of the following three factors: One, you have no fixed address. Two, there is probable cause to suspect that you will conceal or destroy evidence. Three, there is probable cause to suspect that you will attempt to flee.
translation_C: If there is sufficient reason to suspect that you have committed a crime, and there is also sufficient reason to suspect that you do not have a fixed residence, or that you may destroy evidence or flee, you may be detained.
translation_D: If you have reasonable grounds to suspect that you have committed a crime, and if you have reasonable grounds to suspect that you have an indefinite residence or that you will destroy evidence or flee, you may be detained.

source: 拘留期间原则上为10天。

translation_B: The detention period is, in principle, 10 days.

translation_D: The duration of detention is 10 days in principle.

source: 但是根据情况，有可能不到10天就会被释放，也有可能再延长10天以内的拘留期间。

translation_B: However, depending on the circumstances, the detainee may be released before the 10-day period is up, or the detention may be extended for an additional period of less than 10 days.
translation_C: However, in some cases, a person may be released before the 10 days have passed, or the detention period may be extended by an additional number of days within those 10 days.
translation_D: However, in some cases, they may be released before the end of 10 days, or their detention may be extended for up to 10 days.

source: 现在我念申请拘留理由的犯罪事实，你先好好地听。

source: (控诉的)论述中心内容如下，即被告人并没有认识到其进口的物品为兴奋剂。原判认为被告人拥有上述认识而认定其进口兴奋剂的犯罪成立，这当中存在着明显的，对判决有影响的事实误认。
translation_A: The argument is that, in short, since the accused was not aware that the goods involved in the import in this case were methamphetamine, there is a clear misunderstanding of the facts in the original judgment that the defendant was found guilty of importing methamphetamine on the basis of such knowledge.
translation_B: In essence, the argument is that since the defendant had no awareness that the goods imported in this case were stimulants, the original judgment that found the defendant guilty of importing stimulants, assuming that the defendant had such awareness, contained a mistaken recognition of a fact that obviously influenced the verdict.
translation_C: The argument, in essence, is that since the defendant did not have awareness that the items involved in this importation case were stimulants, the original ruling, which recognized the offense of stimulant importation based on the defendant's awareness, contains a clear factual error that affects the judgment.
translation_D: The essence of the Statement of Reasons for Appeal is as follows: The judgment in prior instance found the defendant guilty of the import of a stimulant drug. It found that he/she had the knowledge that the material imported in this case was a stimulant drug. However, since he/she did not have such knowledge, the judgment has an error in its fact finding which apparently affected the judgment.

source: 但是，根据原判例示的各项证据，可以推认以下事实。即被告人在本案之前，作为○○货船的船员大约20多次往返于日本国与○○国之间，而且于○○国理应受到作为海员的教育。因此被告人应当拥有关于禁止走私兴奋剂及海关法规的知识，并应了解兴奋剂大约是什么样的物品。
translation_A: However, from the pieces of evidence listed in the judgment in prior instance, this court finds that the defendant, as a mariner on the freighter __, had sailed between Country ______ and Japan some 20 times and that while receiving education as a mariner in the same country, he/she obtained knowledge about prohibition against smuggling of stimulant drugs and other knowledge of customs-related laws. Therefore, it is assumed that he/she knew what kind of substance a stimulant drug was.
translation_B: However, according to the evidence presented in the original judgment, the defendant had traveled back and forth between Japan and XX countries about 20 times as a seafarer on the cargo ship XX up to this case, and it is recognized that he had acquired knowledge of the prohibition of smuggling such as stimulant crimes and customs laws and regulations in receiving education as a seafarer in XX country. It is presumed that he was generally aware of what kind of goods methamphetamine was.
translation_C: However, based on the evidence presented in the original judgment, it is acknowledged that the defendant, having worked as a crew member on the cargo ship ○○ for approximately 20 round trips between Japan and ○○, had knowledge of the prohibition on smuggling narcotics and other substances, as well as relevant customs regulations, gained through their education and training as a crew member in ○○, and it can be inferred that they were aware of the general nature of the stimulant drugs.
translation_D: Based on the evidence presented in the original judgment, it is acknowledged that the defendant has traveled approximately 20 times between Japan and ○○ country as a crew member of the cargo ship ○○. Furthermore, it is recognized that, during the defendant's training as a crew member in ○○ country, they acquired knowledge that the smuggling of stimulants and the like is prohibited, as well as understanding of customs-related laws and regulations. Therefore, it is inferred that the defendant was generally aware of what kind of substance stimulants are.

source: 而且，以此为前提，在委托搬运本案物品时，甲对被告人所作的，关于物品的搬运及交接方法的指示内容带有极高的隐蔽性，被告人已确认本案物品为装在5只塑料袋里的，白色的晶体性物质，搬入的手段，方法为夹带兴奋剂时常见的，典型的隐藏搬运方法，以及案发前后湮灭证据的行为，被告人对搜查官所作的供词等记录，并综合此认定的各项情节，被告人所作的，关于不知本案物品为兴奋剂的辩解并不足以置信，可以认定被告人在进行本次进口时，已认识到本案物品为兴奋剂。
translation_A: Taking into account the instructions for the transportation and delivery of the object in question, which were extremely secretive when the defendant was entrusted with the transportation of the object by party A, the fact that the defendant confirmed that the object in question was a white crystalline substance divided into five vinyl bags, the fact that the method of transportation was typical of the method used to smuggle stimulants, and other circumstances such as the destruction of evidence before and after the incident and the content of the defendant's statements to the investigator, the defendant's explanation that he did not know the object in question was a stimulant is not credible at all, and it is reasonable to conclude that the defendant recognized that the object in question was a stimulant at the time of importation.
translation_B: Based on the following premise: when instructed by Party A to transport the items in question, the instructions regarding the method of transportation or delivery of said items were extremely secretive; the defendant confirmed that the items were a white crystalline substance divided into five plastic bags; the means and method of importation employed a typical concealment transportation method often used for smuggling stimulants and the like; other circumstances evidenced by records such as concealment efforts around the time of the discovery of the case and the contents of the defendant's statements to investigators—taken together, the defendant's explanation that they did not know the items were stimulants is hardly credible. Therefore, it is reasonable to conclude that the defendant was aware that the items in question were stimulants at the time of importation.
translation_C: Based on this assumption, the defendant's explanation that he/she did not know that the substance in question was a stimulant drug is not reliable at all in light of the following: First, at the time that the defendant was requested by A to carry the material in question, the directions given as to how to transport and deliver it had all the indications of secrecy. Second, the defendant found that the material in question was a white crystalline substance divided into five (5) vinyl bags. Third, the manner in which the material was carried into Japan is a typical undercover method common to transporting stimulant drugs and other drugs. Fourth, there are additional factors shown in the record such as attempts by the defendant to destroy the evidence before and after this case came to light and the statements given by the defendant to investigators. Therefore, it is appropriate to find that the defendant had knowledge at the time of the import in question that the substance in question was a stimulant drug.
translation_D: Based on this premise, the defendant confirmed that the instructions on how to transport or deliver the goods when requested by the First Party were extremely confidential, that the accused confirmed that the goods were a white crystalline substance divided into five plastic bags, and that the means of delivery, Considering the fact that the method adopted the typical concealment and transportation method that is often used when bringing in methamphetamine, etc., and other circumstances recognized by the record, such as the destruction of evidence before and after the discovery of this case, and the contents of the accused's statement to the investigating officer, the defendant's excuse that he did not know that the goods in question were methamphetamine is not credible at all. It is reasonable to admit that the accused was aware that the article in question was a methamphetamine.

source: 因此，原判综合其例示的各项证据所认定的，原判所示事实是恰当的，并无事实的误认，(控诉的)论述宗旨是没有理由的。
translation_A: Therefore, it is reasonable for the original judgment to have determined the original facts as they are, by integrating all the evidence presented, and there is no factual error in the original judgment, so the argument is unjustified.
translation_B: Therefore, it is appropriate that the original judgment recognized the facts as stated by comprehensively considering each piece of evidence presented. There is no factual error in the original judgment, so the argument lacks merit.
translation_C: Therefore, this court finds that it was proper that the judgment in prior instance found the facts as cited therein based on the pieces of evidence as listed therein, and that there is no error in fact finding. Thus, there is no ground for appeal.
translation_D: Therefore, it is reasonable that the original judgment found the facts of the original trial by combining each of the evidences presented, and since there is no factual error in the original judgment, the argument is without merit.

source: (控诉的)论述中心内容为原判的量刑即判处被告人禁锢1年零6个月过重失当。
translation_A: The argument presented in this appeal in brief claims that the sentence given by the court of prior instance, one year and six months imprisonment without work, is improper in its severity.
translation_B: The argument is, in short, that the sentencing of the original judgment that sentenced the defendant to one year and six months in prison was too heavy and unjust.
translation_C: In short, the appeal argues that the original sentence of one year and six months imprisonment imposed on the defendant was too severe and unjust.
translation_D: The argument is essentially that the sentence of one year and six months of imprisonment given to the defendant in the original ruling is excessively severe and therefore unjust.

source: 根据记录，本案事故是由于被告人的过失造成的，即被告人在始动汽车时只注意到前方汽车的行驶，却没有确认左方的安全，使自己的车与骑着自行车正在横穿人行道中的受害人相撞而使其颠倒并死亡。对照(被告人的)过失及结果的重大性，即使充分考虑控诉论述所指出的对被告人有利的情节，仍可认定原判的量刑在其宣告时是恰当的。
translation_A: According to the record, the accident in question occurred due to the defendant's negligence in proceeding without checking the safety on the left side after assuming the vehicle in front had started moving. As a result, the defendant's vehicle collided with and knocked down the victim, who was riding a bicycle on the pedestrian crossing, leading to the victim's death. Considering the negligence and the severity of the outcome, even after fully taking into account the favorable circumstances for the defendant pointed out in the argument, it can be recognized that the sentence in the original judgment was appropriate at the time it was pronounced.
translation_B: According to the record, the accident in this case was as follows: the defendant, while driving an automobile, hit, knocked down and caused the death of the victim who was riding a bicycle in a crosswalk, due to the defendant' s negligence in that he/she started his/her automobile and proceeded just following the start of the preceding vehicle, without confirming safety on the left. Reflecting upon the seriousness of both the negligence and the result of the accident, and even duly considering the circumstances that have been presented in favor of the defendant, sentencing of the judgment in prior instance as handed down at the time should be recognized as proper.
translation_C: According to the record, the accident in this case was caused by the defendant's negligence in starting the car in front of him without checking the safety of the left side, causing the victim who was riding a bicycle on the pedestrian crossing to collide with his car and cause him to die. It can be admitted that it was reasonable at the time of the sentence.
translation_D: According to the record, the accident in question occurred due to the defendant's negligence in proceeding with the start without confirming the safety on the left side, conceding to the departure of the preceding vehicle, thereby colliding and knocking down the victim who was proceeding on a crosswalk on a bicycle, resulting in death, and in light of the negligence and severity of the consequences, even considering the favorable circumstances pointed out by the defense's argument, the original judgment's sentencing was deemed reasonable at the time of its pronouncement.

source: 但是，根据本次审理调查事实的结果，原判后，(被告人)与受害人的遗属之间已达成从任意保险中...追加支付共计2000万日元的协议，受害感情由于该协议的达成而得以进一步的缓解。考虑到上述情节，在现阶段不得不说原判的量刑没有作出缓刑的决定过重失当，如果不予撤销是违反正义的。
translation_A: However, according to the results of the fact-finding investigation in the current trial, after the original verdict, a settlement was reached with the victim's bereaved family to pay a total of 20 million yen, including from voluntary insurance and others. Along with the establishment of this settlement, the feelings of the bereaved have further softened, and a petition has been submitted by them requesting leniency in the disposition. Considering these circumstances, it is recognized that the sentence in the original verdict is excessively harsh in that it did not allow for a suspension of execution at this point in time, and it must be said that failing to overturn it would clearly be contrary to justice.
translation_B: However, according to the results of the examination of the facts by this court, the court finds that after the judgment in prior instance, a settlement was made between the victim's family and the side of the defendant and the insurance, etc. to pay a total of 20 million yen, and as the feelings of the victim's family concerning the accident were mitigated by the settlement, the victim's family hoped in writing that the court grant leniency. In recognition of these circumstances, the sentencing of the judgment in prior instance should be considered too severe, at the present time, on the point that the judgment in prior instance did not grant suspension of the execution of the sentence. It would be clearly unjust if this court did not order a reversal on that point.
translation_C: However, as a result of the fact-finding investigation in this trial, it has been revealed that, after the original judgment, a settlement was reached with the victim's family, under which an additional payment of 20 million yen was made from voluntary insurance, and as a result of the settlement, the victim's family's feelings of resentment towards the defendant have subsided, and the family has even petitioned for a lenient disposition, and in light of these circumstances, the sentence imposed by the original judgment, in not suspending the execution of the sentence at this point in time, is clearly excessive and would be a clear injustice if it were not overturned.
translation_D: However, according to the results of the investigation into the facts of this trial, after the original judgment, there was a dispute with the victim's family and from voluntary insurance. Based on the fact that a settlement was reached by paying a total of 20 million yen, and that the victim's feelings were further alleviated by the conclusion of the settlement, and that the victim's family had made an appeal for leniency, the sentencing of the original judgment was weighted in that the execution of the sentence was not suspended at this time. It must be said that it is clearly contrary to justice if it is not abrogated.

source: 因此，根据刑诉法(刑事诉讼法)第396条规定驳回本次控诉，并根据刑法第21条规定，将本次审理中未决羁押天数中的50天抵折原判刑罚，本次审理所需的诉讼费用，运用刑诉法(刑事诉讼法)第181条第1款正文规定，判由被告人负担，以此为主文所示的判决。
translation_A: Pursuant to Article 396 of the Code of Criminal Procedure, the appeal in this case is hereby dismissed. Fifty days of pre-sentencing detention shall be credited towards the sentence, pursuant to Article 21 of the Penal Code. The costs of this trial shall be borne by the defendant, as per the main clause of Article 181, Paragraph 1 of the Code of Criminal Procedure.
translation_B: Therefore, the appeal in this case is dismissed in accordance with Article 396 of the Criminal Procedure Code, and 50 days of the pretrial detention in the trial are included in the sentence of the original judgment in accordance with Article 21 of the Penal Code, and the costs of the proceedings at this trial shall be borne by the accused by applying the text of Article 181, Paragraph 1 of the Criminal Procedure Code, and the judgment is made as follows.
translation_C: Accordingly, this appeal is dismissed based on Article 396 of the Code of Criminal Procedure. In accordance with Article 21 of the Penal Code, 50 days of the total number of days spent in pre-sentencing detention for trial in this instance shall be deducted from the period of imprisonment imposed by the judgment in prior instance. Applying the main clause of Article 181, paragraph (1) of the Code of Criminal Procedure, this court orders the defendant to bear the court costs in this instance. Thus, the court pronounces the judgment as stated in the main text.
translation_D: Therefore, in accordance with Article 396 of the Code of Criminal Procedure, the appeal in this case is dismissed. Additionally, by applying Article 21 of the Penal Code, 50 days of pre-sentencing detention during this trial are included in the sentence handed down by the original judgment. The costs of the proceedings in this trial shall be borne by the defendant, pursuant to the main text of Article 181, Paragraph 1 of the Code of Criminal Procedure. source: 因此，根据刑诉法(刑事诉讼法)第397条第2款规定撤销原判，并根据同法第400条但书规定进而作出以下判决。
translation_A: Therefore, in accordance with Article 397, Paragraph 2 of the Code of Criminal Procedure, the original judgment is set aside, and pursuant to the proviso of Article 400 of the same law, the following judgment is rendered.
translation_B: Therefore, the court reverses the judgment in prior instance based on Article 397, paragraph (2) of the Code of Criminal Procedure, and pronounces the judgment under the proviso clause of Article 400 of the Code as follows:
translation_C: Accordingly, the original judgment is set aside pursuant to Article 397(2) of the Criminal Procedure Code, and the proviso to Article 400 of the same Act is further sentenced as follows:
translation_D: Accordingly, the original judgment is quashed under Article 397, paragraph 2 of the Code of Criminal Procedure, and pursuant to the proviso of Article 400 of the same Code, the court hereby renders the following judgment.

source: 对于原判认定的构成犯罪的事实，运用与原判同样的法令(包括从数罪并罚的处理，刑罚种类的选择)，在该刑期的范围内判处被告人有期徒刑2年10个月，根据刑法第21条规定将原审(第一审)未决羁押天数中的50天抵折上述刑罚。原审及本次审理所需的诉讼费用，根据刑诉法(刑事诉讼法)第181条第1款但书规定，不须被告人负担，以此为主文所示的判决。
translation_A: The same laws and regulations as those of the original judgment apply to the facts that should be a crime found by the original judgment (including the treatment of one crime for the purpose of punishment and the selection of the type of punishment). The defendant shall be sentenced to two years and 10 months in prison within the scope of the sentence, and 50 days out of the number of days of pretrial detention in the original trial shall be included in the sentence in accordance with Article 21 of the Penal Code, and the costs of litigation in the original trial and at this trial shall not be borne by the accused by applying the proviso to Article 181, Paragraph 1 of the Criminal Procedure Code, and the judgment shall be made in accordance with the main sentence.
translation_B: The court applies the same laws and regulations as in the judgment in prior instance to the same facts constituting the crime as in the judgment in prior instance (including the application of the rule of treating plural crimes as a single crime for sentencing purpose and the choice of the type of punishment), and the court, within the range of the period of imprisonment, sentences the defendant to two years and ten months of imprisonment with work. In accordance with Article 21 of the Penal Code, 50 days of the total number of days spent in pre-sentencing detention at the court in prior instance shall be deducted from the period of said imprisonment. Applying the proviso clause of Article 181, paragraph (1) of the Code of Criminal Procedure, the court does not order the defendant to bear the court costs of the court of prior instance and this court. Thus, the court pronounces the judgments as stated in the main text.
translation_C: The court applies the same legal provisions as the original judgment to the facts constituting the crime recognized in the original judgment (including the handling of a single crime for sentencing and the selection of the type of punishment), and sentences the defendant to two years and ten months of imprisonment within the range of the term. Pursuant to Article 21 of the Penal Code, 50 days of pre-trial detention at the original trial are credited towards this sentence. The court also decides, as per Article 181, paragraph 1, proviso of the Code of Criminal Procedure, that the defendant will not bear the litigation costs incurred in the original and appellate trials, and renders the judgment as stated in the main text.
translation_D: Pursuant to the same legal provisions recognized by the original judgment, the defendant is hereby sentenced to a term of imprisonment of 2 years and 10 months, within the applicable range of terms, with 50 days of pre-trial detention credited towards the sentence in accordance with Article 21 of the Criminal Code, and the court hereby waives the imposition of court costs for both instances in accordance with the proviso of Article 181, Paragraph 1 of the Code of Criminal Procedure.

source: 因此，根据刑诉法(刑事诉讼法)第397条第1款，第377条第3项规定撤销原判，并以同法第400条正文将本案发回原审法院即○○简易法院，以此为主文所示的判决。
translation_A: Therefore, the original judgment is set aside pursuant to Article 397, Paragraph 1 and Article 377, Item 3 of the Criminal Procedure Code, and the case is remanded to the Summary Court, which is the original court, pursuant to Article 400 of the same Law, and the judgment is rendered as follows.
translation_B: The original judgment is here by revoked under Article 397, paragraph 1, and Article 377, item 3 of the Code of Criminal Procedure, and this case is hereby remanded to the original court, namely the ○○ Summary Court, pursuant to Article 400, paragraph 1 of the same Code.
translation_C: Therefore, pursuant to Article 397, Paragraph 1, and Article 377, Item 3 of the Code of Criminal Procedure, the original judgment is hereby overturned, and pursuant to the main text of Article 400 of the same code, the case is remanded to the original court, which is the ○○ Summary Court, and judgment is rendered as stated in the main sentence.
translation_D: Therefore, in accordance with Article 397, paragraph (1) and Article 377, item (iii) of the Code of Criminal Procedure, the judgment in prior instance is reversed and the case is remanded to the ______ Summary Court, the court in prior instance, in accordance with the main clause of Article 400 of the Code of Criminal Procedure.
